attributes.action: No Aid for Countries with Weapons of Mass Destruction.E.g. Nuclear Bombs
attributes.additional_details:
The PM Must Stop All UK Aid Being Given To Any Country That Has Weapons of Mass Destruction.

A weapon of mass destruction (WMD) is a weapon that can kill and bring significant harm to a large number of humans (and other life forms) and/or cause great damage to man-made structures (e.g. buildings), natural structures (e.g. mountains), or the biosphere in general.NUCLEAR BOMBS.

If they have enough money to build and maintain this, then they should be told unless they spend the money on food for their people who are starving and dieing first, we the British people will not give any aid until they do so.
Our government are planning to spend £26 billion on Trident.The ongoing cost will be over £1 billion every year.So we can say that the countries involed have got this to spend on food for their people.
If after this they have not got enough money for food for their people we the British people will help them.
